newsitem.title: USA: Star Multi Care sets stock buyback.
newsitem.headline: Star Multi Care sets stock buyback.

text.p: Star Multi Care Services Inc said Friday its directors had authorized the repurchase, from time to time, of up to 200,000 shares on the open market or in negotiated transactions, depending on market conditions and other factors.
Star Multi Care said it has about 4.0 million shares outstanding.

"We sincerely believe that Star's stock is undervalued and represents an attractive investment opportunity. The buyback program reflects our strong belief in Star's future prospects and our commitment to serving our shareholders well," said Chief Executive Stephen Sternbach.
